reviews.review: Best scary game, simple gameplay but alot of character to explore

"Worse game I've ever seen.  Why am I still playing it !?"

EDIT nÂ°5: (516h)
Yeah no, buy VHS instead.

EDIT nÂ°4: (504.9h) :]
Dont buy this game. Im dead serious this time. The matchmaking is broken and its unplayable as survivor. Thanks I hate it BHVR. Will never play this game again. Players have no skill and when you tell them how bad they are they just burst into toxic and useless comments. Killers are camping, survivors are the dumbest I've ever seen them and the new update isn't going to change shit. Fuck you bhvr, a game I once loved is now ruined.

EDIT nÂ°3:
Still garbage after 400h
There are more afk killers and face campers than I ever saw on this game.

EDIT nÂ°2:
Still garbage after 300h but I made some friends on the way.
Nice Dead Hard by the way Behavior.

EDIT:
Still garbage after 200h
Aren't we all loving the good old tunneling ?
Hide & seek, but with blood and fear

-Worst rank matching no balance.
-Toxic players. INDâ™¥GS
-Wasting time & money
olo

spent 968 hours on this game and a lot of money on cosmetic.

Only a third was worth it.

Game is fun with friend, up to a point.

There is far more better on the market.
do 2 gens then get left behind
Buen juego para pasar el rato con tus amigos
Kept screaming like an 8 year old boy when playing as survivor (I get scared easily) and kept cussing while playing as the killer. I love this game so far ğŸ‘
Jogo muito bom, apesar de ter que gastar em dlc's adicionais.

It is a really fun and competitive game that also has a really good and Non-Toxic Community. It has hours upon hours of fun and new gameplay for anybody to enjoy. I would highly recommend this game to everybody to try out.

Game is very fun, and Semi-difficult, I'd say about a 9/10 game, it is something you could play for thousands of hours and not get bored based solely on the mixes you can do. It's also pretty simple to learn, yet very difficult to master, as it's mainly mind-game based.

(watch some videos on it before deciding if you want it or not)
